Message:
Thanks to Fortina’s exhaustive
efforts in nursing me,
I managed to survive.

This plague is potent enough
to wipe out an entire village...

It’s nothing short of a miracle
that I was saved.

And the one who performed
that miracle was Fortina.

I’m here today only because
she persisted against the odds
that were stacked against her.

If this is the “will of God,”
as she often says,

then that must mean
I was kept alive to
protect her.
not to God, but to myself...

Fortina saved me,
so I’ll devote this
life of mine to her.
